info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: travail-emploi.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: travail-emploi.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 58880
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 58880
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 8, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	1200	IN	MX	100 pro075001app061.social.gouv.fr.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	1200	IN	MX	10 pro075001app411.social.gouv.fr.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	1200	IN	MX	100 pro093001app059.social.gouv.fr.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	1200	IN	MX	100 pro075001app063.social.gouv.fr.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	1200	IN	MX	10 pro075001app410.social.gouv.fr.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	1200	IN	MX	10 pro093001app412.social.gouv.fr.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	1200	IN	MX	10 pro093001app413.social.gouv.fr.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	1200	IN	MX	100 pro093001app060.social.gouv.fr.

request:
GET /robots.txt HTTP/1.1
Host: travail-emploi.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Date: Sun, 19 Jun 2022 05:16:12 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=5, max=100
Last-Modified: Sun, 19 Jun 2022 05:16:12 GMT
Referrer-Policy: strict-origin
Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-dicom-portail-dares2.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=!z3gUwEv59GvskEXkuunEfrOB80n4KQK5I3FGoeyjra1MyIeO2/H9mE9z4TPhJfhdAdnO8HSx2xW9HeeOJmX8FQyzjSo=; path=/; Httponly; Secure
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
Vary: Accept-Encoding
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: sameorigin
X-Spip-Cache: 2592000
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

# robots.txt
# @url: http://travail-emploi.gouv.fr

User-agent: Twitterbot
Disallow: /local/

Allow: /local/cache-vignettes/

Crawl-delay: 1

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 10204
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 10204
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:laval.jouve-hdi.com -all"
